languages.text: {n}Обычные контрабандисты не одеваются столь вычурно, не ведут себя столь дерзко и вряд ли одним своим видом способны испортить настроение Наместнику Футфола. Эта женщина потеряла множество людей, чтобы добыть эти "редчайшие ценности". А чтобы вернуть их, обратилась именно к Владайму Токара, покровителю всего хладного торга в Просторе. Ее груз — не что иное, как ксеноартефакты, творения врагов Человечества, клейменные ересью.{/n}

{n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обычные контрабандисты не одеваются столь вычурно, не ведут себя столь дерзко и вряд ли одним своим видом способны испортить настроение Наместнику Футфола. Эта женщина потеряла множество людей, чтобы добыть эти "редчайшие ценности". А чтобы вернуть их, обратилась именно к Владайму Токара, покровителю всего хладного торга в Просторе. Ее груз — не что иное, как ксеноартефакты, творения врагов Человечества, клейменные ересью.{/n}

This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}如果仅仅是普通的走私者，恐怕不会穿得如此招摇，做事风格不会如此厚颜无耻。自然，也不太可能仅仅是出现在总督面前，就惹得他大发雷霆。为了得到这些“极其贵重的珍品”，这个女人损失了很多手下。为了重新找回这批货物，她不得不求助于弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，整个科罗努斯扩区冷市贸易的赞助人。因此，她所说的货物应该是异形造物，是人类之敌制造出来的异端物品。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}如果仅仅是普通的走私者，恐怕不会穿得如此招摇，做事风格不会如此厚颜无耻。自然，也不太可能仅仅是出现在总督面前，就惹得他大发雷霆。为了得到这些“极其贵重的珍品”，这个女人损失了很多手下。为了重新找回这批货物，她不得不求助于弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，整个科罗努斯扩区冷市贸易的赞助人。因此，她所说的货物应该是异形造物，是人类之敌制造出来的异端物品。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una contrabandista normal no se vestiría de forma tan ostentosa ni se comportaría con tanta osadía. Además, su mera presencia no enfurecería al Señor de Paso. Esta mujer ha perdido a numerosos subordinados para obtener sus «recursos verdaderamente singulares» y acude a Vladaym Tocara, patrón de todo el Comercio Frío de la Extensión, para recuperarlos. Su mercancía debe estar compuesta por xenoartefactos, creaciones herejes de los enemigos de la Humanidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una contrabandista normal no se vestiría de forma tan ostentosa ni se comportaría con tanta osadía. Además, su mera presencia no enfurecería al Señor de Paso. Esta mujer ha perdido a numerosos subordinados para obtener sus «recursos verdaderamente singulares» y acude a Vladaym Tocara, patrón de todo el Comercio Frío de la Extensión, para recuperarlos. Su mercancía debe estar compuesta por xenoartefactos, creaciones herejes de los enemigos de la Humanidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}普通の密輸人であれば、これほど大仰に着飾ったり、図々しい振る舞いをする必要はないだろうし、その外見でフットフォールの領主の機嫌を損ねる必要もないはずだ。この女性は、その『希少な品』を手に入れるために多くの人員を失い、それを取り戻すためにこのエクスパンスのあらゆる闇取引のパトロンたるヴラダイム・トカラを頼ったのだ。彼女の貨物は、異種族のアーティファクトにほかならない。それは人類の敵の創造物であり、異端の烙印を押されたものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}普通の密輸人であれば、これほど大仰に着飾ったり、図々しい振る舞いをする必要はないだろうし、その外見でフットフォールの領主の機嫌を損ねる必要もないはずだ。この女性は、その『希少な品』を手に入れるために多くの人員を失い、それを取り戻すためにこのエクスパンスのあらゆる闇取引のパトロンたるヴラダイム・トカラを頼ったのだ。彼女の貨物は、異種族のアーティファクトにほかならない。それは人類の敵の創造物であり、異端の烙印を押されたものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'ordinaire, les contrebandiers ne s'habillent pas de manière aussi ostentatoire et n'affichent pas une telle effronterie ; ils sont donc bien moins susceptibles d'agacer le suzerain de Castel par leur simple présence. Cette femme a perdu bon nombre de ses associés pour obtenir ces marchandises. Afin de les récupérer, elle s'est tournée vers celui-là même qui gère le Commerce Froid dans toutes les Étendues : Vladaym Tocara. Sa marchandise consiste forcément en des xéno-artefacts, créations des ennemis de l'humanité considérées comme des hérésies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'ordinaire, les contrebandiers ne s'habillent pas de manière aussi ostentatoire et n'affichent pas une telle effronterie ; ils sont donc bien moins susceptibles d'agacer le suzerain de Castel par leur simple présence. Cette femme a perdu bon nombre de ses associés pour obtenir ces marchandises. Afin de les récupérer, elle s'est tournée vers celui-là même qui gère le Commerce Froid dans toutes les Étendues : Vladaym Tocara. Sa marchandise consiste forcément en des xéno-artefacts, créations des ennemis de l'humanité considérées comme des hérésies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gewöhnliche Schmuggler kleiden sich nicht derart auffällig und verhalten sich nicht so verwegen, und sie verderben dem Lehnsherren von Footfall wohl kaum durch ihre bloße Anwesenheit die Laune. Diese Frau hat viele Verbündete verloren, um diese "seltenen Güter" zu beschaffen, und um sie zurückzuholen, hat sie sich an Vladaym Tocara gewandt, den Patron sämtlichen Kalthandels in der Ausdehnung. Ihre Fracht kann nichts anderes sein als Xeno-Artefakte — Schöpfungen der Feinde der Menschheit, von Ketzerei durchzogen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gewöhnliche Schmuggler kleiden sich nicht derart auffällig und verhalten sich nicht so verwegen, und sie verderben dem Lehnsherren von Footfall wohl kaum durch ihre bloße Anwesenheit die Laune. Diese Frau hat viele Verbündete verloren, um diese "seltenen Güter" zu beschaffen, und um sie zurückzuholen, hat sie sich an Vladaym Tocara gewandt, den Patron sämtlichen Kalthandels in der Ausdehnung. Ihre Fracht kann nichts anderes sein als Xeno-Artefakte — Schöpfungen der Feinde der Menschheit, von Ketzerei durchzogen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sıradan kaçakçılar, böylesine cafcalı giyinip küstahça davranmaz. Ayrıca sırf onları gördü diye Binliman Emîri'nin keyfi de kaçmıyordur. Bu kadın, "inanılmaz nadir mallar" elde etmek için çok adam kaybetmiş ve mallarını geri almak için Enginlik'teki tüm Soğuk Ticaret'in hamisi olan Vladaym Tocara'dan yardım istemiş. O kargoda mutlaka zeno eserleri, yani İnsanlığın düşmanlarının ürettiği, kâfirlik damgası taşıyan mallar olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ordinary smugglers do not dress so ostentatiously or behave so brazenly, and they are unlikely to spoil the mood of the Liege of Footfall with their mere appearance. This woman lost many people to obtain these "rarest of goods," and to get them back, she turned to Vladaym Tocara, the patron of all Cold Trade in the Expanse. Her cargo can be nothing other than xeno-artefacts — creations of the enemies of Humanity, branded with heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sıradan kaçakçılar, böylesine gösterişli bir biçimde giyinmiyor veya arsızca davranmıyor; ayrıca sırf onları görünce Binliman Emîri'nin keyfi de kaçmıyordur. Bu kadın, "inanılmaz nadir mallar" elde etmek için çok adam kaybetmiş ve mallarını geri almak için Enginlik'teki tüm Soğuk Ticaret'in hâmisi olan Vladaym Tocara'dan yardım istemiş. Demek ki o kargoda mutlaka zeno eserleri olmalı... İnsanlığın düşmanlarının ürettiği, kâfirlik damgası taşıyan mallar bunlar.{/n}
